title: Number of Crunchyroll subscribers 2012 to 2018
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in thousands in each Month on the y axis.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The highest Month November 2018 has 1900.0 more Number of users in thousands than the lowest Month September 2012.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in thousands for 6 number of Months.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in thousands in each Month on the y axis.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The highest Month November 2018 has 1900.0 more Number of users in thousands than the lowest Month September 2012.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in thousands in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of users in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2018 and lowest at Month September 2012.
Second maximum Number of users in thousands is found at Month February 2017.
The highest Month November 2018 has 1900.0 more Number of users in thousands than the lowest Month September 2012.
Month November 2018 is higher than any other Months with value 2000.0, followed by February 2017, and November 2015. Down to Month September 2012 with the lowest value 100.0.
Over the past 6 Months, the Number of users in thousands has decreased.
The highest value 2000.0 at November 2018 is almost 2.7 times larger than the average value 741.67.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 4450.0.
